column5: TXT: BLUEDOOR to 24587 & Live 3D tour this house now! Make our renovated 2 bedroom 2 bath American Craftsman style bungalow your home for your next visit to Houston! We have enough room to easily fit 6 but can accommodate 10 if needed. House is fully updated with luxury finishes minutes from Museum District, Downtown Houston, parks, zoo, medical center and University of Houston. Kitchen and baths with household amenities included and ready to live in for long or short term stays.
column8: Blue Door Bungalow - Luxury Home Downtown, UofH
